alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Craven; Greene; Lenoir; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 4:29PM EDT until May 09 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Greene County in eastern North Carolina... Northeastern Lenoir County in eastern North Carolina... Northwestern Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Pitt County in eastern North Carolina... Southwestern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grifton, or near Ayden, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenville, New Bern, Winterville, Ayden, River Bend, Grifton, Vanceboro, Askins, Shelmerdine, Calico, Cayton, Black Jack, Fort Barnwell, Jasper, Tuscarora, Wilmar, Roundtree, Ernul, Cove City and Gardnerville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
